title: Standardized Geography for Economists
code: library(econid) head(country_aggregates) ##   country_name      country_group group_type ## 1    Australia Advanced Economies        IMF ## 2      Austria Advanced Economies        IMF ## 3      Belgium Advanced Economies        IMF ## 4       Canada Advanced Economies        IMF ## 5  Switzerland Advanced Economies        IMF ## 6       Cyprus Advanced Economies        IMF head(country_codes) ##          country is_wb_country        wb_name  cldr_short_en iso2c iso3c iso3n ## 1    Afghanistan          TRUE    Afghanistan    Afghanistan    AF   AFG     4 ## 2  Åland Islands         FALSE           <NA>  Åland Islands    AX   ALA   248 ## 3        Albania          TRUE        Albania        Albania    AL   ALB     8 ## 4        Algeria          TRUE        Algeria        Algeria    DZ   DZA    12 ## 5 American Samoa          TRUE American Samoa American Samoa    AS   ASM    16 ## 6        Andorra          TRUE        Andorra        Andorra    AD   AND    20 ##   imf continent country_name_en_regex ## 1 512      Asia                afghan ## 2  NA    Europe                 åland ## 3 914    Europe               albania ## 4 612    Africa               algeria ## 5 859   Oceania  ^(?=.*americ).*samoa ## 6  NA    Europe               andorra

title: Standardized Geography for Economists
text: usethis::use_r(name=) creates pair source test files selected filename source file already exists open IDE, can instead usethis::use_test() create appropriately named test file

title: Standardized Geography for Economists
text: usethis::use_package(package) adds named package DESCRIPTION dependencies usethis::use_dev_package(package, type="Suggests") adds development dependency (won’t installed end-users) usethis::use_import_from(package, fun=) adds single function import roxygen2 docs

title: Standardized Geography for Economists
text: renv::init() sets project’s file system dependency management renv renv::install() installs dependencies listed DESCRIPTION, including Suggests/development dependencies renv::snapshot() regenerates lockfile match currently installed dependencies, excluding Suggests/development dependencies renv::update() updates package dependencies latest versions renv::restore() installs dependencies declared lockfile

title: Standardized Geography for Economists
text: usethis::use_data(some_dataframe, name="filename") saves data object “data/filename.rda” use package export usethis::use_data_raw("dataset_name") creates empty R script “data-raw” directory—put automation scripts used generating/updating exported dataset don’t want export end-user

title: Standardized Geography for Economists
text: usethis::use_vignette("vignette_name") creates new vignette template “vignettes” directory usethis::use_article("article_name") creates new article template “vignettes/articles” directory usethis::use_package_doc() creates package-level documentation file

title: Standardized Geography for Economists
text: devtools::document() generates documentation files roxygen2 comments devtools::build_readme() builds README.md file README.Rmd devtools::build() builds package .tar.gz file devtools::install() installs package locally devtools::check() runs R CMD check package devtools::test() runs tests package

title: Standardized Geography for Economists
text: pkgdown::build_site() builds documentation website package devtools::build_vignettes() builds vignettes package

text: devtools::release() guides CRAN submission process Update cran-comments.md necessary explanations CRAN maintainers Use devtools::check_rhub() test R-hub submission
